title: Product Identifiers
description: This mixin is used to capture properties related to product identifiers generic to all industries.

xdm:productSKU.title: Product SKU
xdm:productSKU.description: The unique SKU (stock keeping unit) of the product assigned by the vendor.

xdm:productGTIN.title: Product GTIN
xdm:productGTIN.description: Global Trade Item Number of the product.

xdm:productImageURL.title: Product Image URL
xdm:productImageURL.description: The URL for the primary product image of the product.

xdm:productSearchKeywords.title: Product Search Keywords
xdm:productSearchKeywords.description: The search keywords associated with the product.
